item.title: Create Facebook Video Ad - Upwork
item.description:
I own a dental office and I am looking for the following:

So basically, I have about 2-3 videos on Facebook ads. I've gotten the subtitles, and other stuff, but I want you to make it flashier, and more enticing to click and fill out a form, or schedule a dental patient.


Or you can just NOT use my 2-3 videos, and just make a 10-15 second video about dental implants, our dental office. And that would be it.

Either way, I want about 3 videos (each 10-15 seconds long)

Budget: $99
Posted On: June 18, 2024 03:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Facebook Ad Campaign, Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design
Skills: Facebook Ad Campaign, Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: LOOKING for TIKTOK / YOUTUBE CONTENT CREATORS! (UGC) *California* - Upwork
item.description:
Have you always wanted to make YOUTUBE or TIKTOK videos for a living? Then THIS is the job for you!

We are currently hiring for a LARGE gaming YouTube channel and are looking for content creators in the LOS ANGELES area that are looking for FULL TIME work.

If selected, you would be creating content for a massive kids YouTube gaming channel full time. This would involve doing fun challenges, gameplays, and more.

An ideal candidate would be located in Los Angeles or the surrounding area, be obsessed with making videos and having YouTube as their full-time job, and be energetic and charismatic on camera.

If you are interested, please include a link to either your social media (TikTok, YouTube, or Instagram), or some sort of portfolio, such as an actor reel. Candidates that apply WITHOUT these will not be considered.

We look forward to hearing from you soon!

Hourly Range: $30.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 03:26 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Videography
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
